mapper.insert: insert into tbl_free(fno, f_title, f_content, userid, f_pic, fcode) values(seq_free_fno.nextval, #{f_title}, #{f_content}, #{userid}, #{f_pic, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fcode})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_free order by fno desc
select * from (select * from tbl_free order by f_viewcnt desc) where rownum <= 3
select f.*, c.fname from tbl_free f, tbl_fcategory_code c where fno = #{fno} and f.fcode = c.fcode
mapper.update: update tbl_free set f_viewcnt = #{f_viewcnt} + 1 where fno = #{fno}
